text: Jean-François Garreaud (1 April 1946 – 9 July 2020) was a French actor. Garreaud was born in Montmorency, Val-d'Oise, France. His best-known role is that of Jean Dabin in Violette Nozière, released in 1978. He was also known for his role as Henri in I as in Icarus in 1979. Garreaud died on 9 July 2020 in Saint-Jory-de-Chalais, France at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Jean-François Garreaud
